page.title: Nathanaël Houn - Student in computer science

meta.name: Description
meta.content: Welcome to Nathanaël Houn, computer science student in Besançon (France).

meta.name: Keyword
meta.content: Nathanaël Houn, student, computer science, Licence informatique, CMI, Cursus Master en Ingénierie, computer enthousiast

whoami.title: Who am I ?
whoami.content: Already interested in computer since when I was younger, my interest turned into a true passion when I was about 15 years old. I loved experimenting with motherboards, GPUs and others components. I also discovered programing and development on the Internet and in my studies, and I have spent a tremendous amount of time learning these things since 2018.

studies.title: My curriculum
studies.content: After graduated from the baccalauréat program (French High School Diploma) with honours, I decided to study in Computer Science. I chose the Cursus Master en Ingénierie, a french university curriculum at the Franche-Comté's University, where I am currently in my third year of the program. The CMI is an equivalent for the Master of Engineering Program.
studies.link2: The Computer Sciences CMI curriculum in Besançon

content.title: CircleCI Integration Plugin into Mattermost
content.imagealt: The CircleCI Plugin for Mattermost in action
content.description: A Mattermost Plugin for CircleCI to interact with jobs, builds or workflows and receive notifications in Mattermost channels. Winner of the 2020 Mattermost Plugin Bounty Program

content.title: NDI 2020: Web application for surfers
content.description: Web application SurfClean, realised during the Nuit de l'Info 2020 (Night Of Coding), with my team BigEight. Rewarded by two medals.

content.title: Pang
content.description:
Developped during the Software Engineering Initiation Project of my 1st year.
Play a man from Franche-Comté who wants to destroy all the balloons using objects from his dear region. Inspired from the retrogame Pang.

content.title: Discord bot
content.description: A Discord bot, which made me discover JavaScript and Heroku. Interact with our class group. Since rewritten in Python.

content.title: Website of the R&Day 2020
content.description: Website done for the R&Day 2020, an event made by the student of  the IT CMI to raise awareness among digital security.
content.linktext: See the source code of the website

content.title: My Github
content.description: Please feel free to browse through some of my projects either created for the college or on my free time.
